Uses of Interface
com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.conversation_helper.TranscribeDelegate

  • Packages that use TranscribeDelegate 
    Package Description
    com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.conversation_helper
    Helper classes which allow the developer to easily make calls between the 'conversation' services, (Conversation, Speech to Text and Text to Speech).

    • Uses of TranscribeDelegate in com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.conversation_helper

      Methods in com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.conversation_helper with parameters of type TranscribeDelegate 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ConversationHelper.sendVoiceContinuous(InputStream audioStream, TranscribeDelegate delegate)
      Continuously sends voice data from the audioStream to the SpeechToText service.
      void ConversationHelper.sendVoiceContinuous(InputStream audioStream, TranscribeDelegate delegate, RecognizeOptions options)
      Continuously sends voice data from the audioStream to the SpeechToText service.
